newsletter.title: Event Recap: Empower Yourself Workshop
newsletter.description: This event, co-hosted by NSHMBA and SHPE, was focused on empowering individual's brand through a 'Power Profile' assessment and effective coaching tips. We give a big thank you to Janet Zaretsky!

newsletter.title: Event Recap: Public Speaking Workshop w/ UTSHPE
newsletter.description: UTSHPE invited SHPE Austin to host a Public Speaking workshop last week. SHPE Austin Professionals, Stephanie A. and Manuel E., discussed best practices for delivering public speeches. Afterwards, the professionals critiqued UTSHPE participants on their own speeches.

newsletter.title: Intel's Professional and Career Series
newsletter.description: Intel will be hosting a Professional Development and Career Series. This event will have workshops, networking sessions, and a career fair. Breakfast and lunch will be provided.  Date: Feb. 20th (8am-2:30pm) @ Intel (1501 S. Mopac).For more details or to register click on the image

newsletter.title: Spring sports survey ending soon!
newsletter.description:
Gear up as we get ready to prepare for the new athletic season. We have various sports in mind and would like to get your opinion on what to play! If interested, please fill out the survey ASAP.

Click on the image to access the Sports Survey

newsletter.title: Plucker's Wingo Night with your Mentees
newsletter.description:
If you're part of the Manitos/Manitas program or would just like to relax over some food and "WINGO" join us next week at Pluckers on Rio Grande (near UT Campus). There will be prizes!
Date:  Feb. 18th @ 9PM Click on the image to see event details.

newsletter.title:
Date change for
SHPE's & Salsa Social
newsletter.description:
SHPE Austin invites you to take a break from work and come out to our annual SHPE's and Salsa social. We will be meeting at Shoal Creek Event Center (there is a cover charge). 
Date:  Feb. 25th starting at 10pm. Click on the image to see the map details.

newsletter.title: SWE/SHPE Austin team up to volunteer at AE Regional Science Festival
newsletter.description:
SWE & SHPE Austin Winter will have SNOW-making station at the AE Regional Science Festival. This is a great opportunity for people interested in meeting the next generation of young scientists from Central Texas! Volunteers are also encouraged to help out other times during the 3-day event.
Date: Feb. 20th (9AM-2PM)

newsletter.title: Introduce a Girl to Engineering
newsletter.description:
Join SHPE Austin Professional Chapter as we host a Table Top Hover Crafts activity and promote STEM to over 1,500 kids.  We'll need volunteers for presenting the activity, guiding kids and parents with the activity, and helping people in/out of the activity room. 
Date: Feb. 27th, 2016 (12- 4PM).

newsletter.title: Lunch N Learn by
newsletter.description: SHPE Jr. at LBJ High School is in need of mentors for Lunch and Learns (virtual or in-person) and SHPE Jr. Robotics Meetings. This is a great opportunity if you would like to mentor students interested in robotics or STEM in general. This survey does not commit you to an event, it just shows your interest.

newsletter.title: Scholarship Raffle benefitting local students interested in STEM
newsletter.description:
We are still having a Gift Card Raffle to help us achieve our goal of giving away 4 Scholarships this year. If you would like to support this effort, come out to any of our events or contact our Scholarships Director, Stephanie Amrite.


 If you would like to support our cause, please contact Stephanie.

newsletter.title: Regional Leadership Development Conference
newsletter.description:
The student and professional SHPE chapters of Houston will be hosting this year's Regional Leadership Development conference. Expect to network with like-minded professionals, develop as an individual, and find new career possibilities.
Date: March 3-6th, 2016 - Houston, TX.

Check the registration page for more details on cost and lodging options.
